thread.section_title: Hilton Paris Opera - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: worst
thread.title_full: worst - Review of Hilton Paris Opera, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: gyumink2017
title: worst
text: When I checked in, the room I booked was full and I did not receive it. -0- I eventually changed but the schedule was a mess. The room had a broken electrical switch, a Nespresso machine, and no concierge service. It was so absurd that the front door was locked even though there were 3 staff members checking out and leaving the hotel. Eventually, I could call the staff in front of me and open the door. I did not even say a word of greeting. The room is small and cold.
